original_text: Only the king of Ai was still alive. They caught him and they took him to Joshua.
korean_text: 아이 왕을 사로잡아 여호수아 앞으로 끌어 왔더라

sentences.original_text: Only the king of Ai was still alive
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 아이 왕만이 아직 살아 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they took him to Joshua
